item.title: Data visualization using ggplot2
item.description: Kaplan-Meier survival plots using survminer Code and data could be found in this repository. One Kaplan-Meier plot using survminer survminer::ggsurvplot(survfit(utotalPSM ~ integ, data = total), pval = TRUE, conf.int = TRUE, legend.title = "Hospital type", legend.labs = c("Ordinary Hospitals", "Medical Consortium Hospitals"), submain = "Kaplan-Meier plot for a pool of three patient cohorts", xlab = "Survival length of stay", palette = c("firebrick1", "green4"), font.submain = c(16, "bold")) Arrange 3 survival plots plot3cohorts = survminer::arrange_ggsurvplots( list(ggfei.
